Interface XletFactory<T extends TimePoint>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
Cap, Floor, SeriesOfOptions
public interface XletFactory<T extends TimePoint>

Factory interface for creation of caplets and floorlets

Author:
Luigi Sgro

Method Summary
 Xlet<T> createXlet(T present, T evaluationTime, T cashflowTime, double tenor, double timeStep)
          Create a caplet or floorlet
 

Method Detail

createXlet

Xlet<T> createXlet(T present,
                   T evaluationTime,
                   T cashflowTime,
                   double tenor,
                   double timeStep)
Create a caplet or floorlet

Parameters:
present - Present time for discounting
evaluationTime - Time of evaluation of forward rate and payoff
cashflowTime - Time of cashflow, to be discounted to present
tenor - Tenor of the caplet/floorlet
timeStep - Time step used for calculating discount
Returns:
A concrete Xlet: either a caplet of floorlet
